meta.description: Obesity is the second leading cause of preventable death in America after smoking. Lesley Stahl reports on a new medication that helps with weight loss but is wildly expensive and covered by very few insurance companies.

title: Watch 60 Minutes Overtime: Obesity | Sunday on 60 Minutes - Full show on CBS
